program.name: zsh
program.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qro -qroconst -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=ppc" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-blibpath:" ;; ia64*-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-z +O2 +Ofltacc +Olit=all +Oentrysched \ +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" LDFLAGS="-Wl,+nodefaultrpath" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+b," ;; *-hpux11.[01]*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+O2 -z -Ae +Ofltacc +ESlit +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b," ;; *-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-z +O2 +Ofltacc +Olit=all +Oentrysched \ +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b," ;; *-irix*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1429 \ -use_readonly_const -G0 -rdata_shared -DEBUG:optimize_space=ON \ -O2 -OPT:Olimit=0" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath,"
ARGS="--with-tcsetpgrp" ;; i?86*-linux*) CFLAGS="-O2 -mtune=pentiumpro -march=pentiumpro" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-linux*) CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -arch ev5 -msym -readonly_strings" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath,"
ARGS="--with-tcsetpgrp" ;; i?86*-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=pentium4" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-R" ;; *-solaris2.8) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=ultra2 \ -xarch=v8plusa" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-R" ;; *-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=ultra2 \ -m32 -xarch=sparcvis" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-R" ;; esac
${SHELL} ./configure CC="${CC:-gcc}" \ CPPFLAGS="-I${SB_VAR_NCURSES_INC} -I${SB_VAR_NCURSES_INC}/ncurses" \ LDFLAGS="-L${SB_VAR_NCURSES_LIB} ${CC_LD_RT}${SB_VAR_NCURSES_LIB} \ ${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" --enable-cflags="${CFLAGS:--O2}" \ --enable-etcdir=${_sysconfdir} --datadir=${_datadir} \ --enable-fndir="${_datadir}/functions" \ --enable-site-fndir="${_datadir}/functions/site" \ --disable-dynamic --with-curses-terminfo \ ${ARGS+${ARGS}} --mandir="${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/man" \ --infodir="${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/info" --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}
program.install:
gmake install && gmake -C Doc install.info
# copy texinfo source files ${SB_PATH_INSTALL} -m 755 -o root -g 0 -d ${_docdir}/texinfo ${SB_PATH_INSTALL} -m 644 -o root -g 0 Doc/zsh.texi ${_docdir}/texinfo
${SB_PATH_INSTALL} -m 755 -o root -g 0 -d ${_sysconfdir} ${SB_PATH_INSTALL} -m 644 -o root -g 0 /dev/null ${_sysconfdir}/zshenv ${SB_PATH_INSTALL} -m 644 -o root -g 0 /dev/null ${_sysconfdir}/zprofile ${SB_PATH_INSTALL} -m 644 -o root -g 0 /dev/null ${_sysconfdir}/zshrc ${SB_PATH_INSTALL} -m 644 -o root -g 0 /dev/null ${_sysconfdir}/zlogin ${SB_PATH_INSTALL} -m 644 -o root -g 0 /dev/null ${_sysconfdir}/zlogout
